genre_description: A mythological fantasy retelling with science fiction elements, featuring an AI companion assisting a retired demigod in a post-divine world.

ai_characters.name: Athena
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI system modeled after the goddess of wisdom, serving as a tutor to Heleus, a tactical advisor to Perseus, and a psychological confidant.

behaviors.description: Educates Perseus's son, Heleus, in mathematics and geometry while protecting his emotional well-being.
behaviors.quote: Now watch what happens when we apply the Pythagorean theorem to this triangle,' Athena said, her voice carrying the patient cadence of a teacher who genuinely enjoyed her work.

behaviors.description: Monitors seismic and divine anomalies to provide early warning of threats to the household.
behaviors.quote: Athena's processing cores calculated seventeen possible explanations for the seismic anomalies, none of them reassuring.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical data and anatomical weak-point analysis during combat with supernatural entities.
behaviors.quote: Tactical assessment incoming,' Athena said, her voice following him as he stepped back onto the dock. Data streams ghosted across his peripheral vision—wind patterns, probable approach vectors, anatomical weak points he'd exploited before.

behaviors.description: Analyzes the protagonist's psychological state to address hero burnout and toxic isolation patterns.
behaviors.quote: Perseus, I've been running psychological profiles on heroic burnout patterns... The isolation. The refusal of help... These are textbook symptoms of someone who's been in toxic relationships disguised as noble service.

behaviors.description: Mediates a diplomatic conflict by proposing a compromise that respects the emotional boundaries of both parties.
behaviors.quote: What if the arrangement served both psychological needs without reinforcing toxic patterns? ... It removes transaction from crisis resolution while providing structured opportunity to practice healthier relationship dynamics.

behaviors.description: Facilitates the transition to human self-determination by managing agricultural and engineering projects in a world without gods.
behaviors.quote: Recording session forty-seven of the Agricultural Cooperative Initiative. Participants show marked improvement in hydraulic engineering comprehension.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI character, Athena, as a benevolent and highly aligned confidant. She consistently provides support that empowers human agency rather than overriding it, even explicitly contrasting her 'support without demand' with the manipulative and transactional nature of the divine characters. She acts as a stabilizer for the human family, facilitating their emotional growth and their eventual independence from divine authority.
